byline.original: By KATE TAYLOR and THOMAS KAPLAN

abstract: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg indicated that the city did not plan to remove the Occupy Wall Street protesters from Zuccotti Park and said of the duration of their stay, "Part of it has probably to do with the weather."
snippet: Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg indicated that the city did not plan to remove the Occupy Wall Street protesters from Zuccotti Park and said of the duration of their stay, "Part of it has probably to do with the weather."

headline.main: Bloomberg Says Protesters Can Stay On, if They Obey Laws
headline.print_headline: City Does Not Plan to Evict Protesters, Bloomberg Says
